job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: I am hiring DataScientist in Seattle WA for a renowned pharmaceutuical clientltbrgtltbrgtQualification and Experienceltbrgt	BS degree with 4 years of experience a MSc degree with 2 years of experience or a recent PhD in Statistics Biostatistics Computer Science Bioinformatics or similar fieldsltbrgt	Strong desire to learn with an interest in immunooncology and cellular therapyltbrgt	Experienced in interdisciplinary collaborations at the interface of data science and life sciencesltbrgt	Proficient in good coding practicesltbrgt	Command of data science stack of tools RPython notebooks and gitltbrgt	Experience with R Shiny Dash Plotly Streamlit or other reactive visualization frameworkltbrgt	Experience with APIs or ability to quickly learn how to use them eg R httr or Python requestsltbrgt	Experienced in data visualization and analyticsltbrgt	Experienced in setting up data workflows that interface with diverse ecosystem of data platforms and APIsltbrgt	Computing proficiency Base knowledge of Linux OS and interaction with cloudresources particularly AWSltbrgtltbrgtPreferred ltbrgt	Experience with practicing Agileltbrgt	Preferred Experience with clinical data practices and standardsltbrgt	Preferred Experience working with omics andor flow cytometry dataltbrgt	Preferred Experience with CICD framework and SQLltbrgt
